About Me
About Me
I am currently a freshman computer science major at the University of Delaware who is eager to expand his knowledge. With tech being such a broad field I look forward to refining my skills and learning new technologies.

Right now I am looking for any experience I can get my hands on, so feel free to reach out!
Skills
Projects
Projects
Mini Pokedex

An easy to use app that provides the user data about their favorite pokemon, just like the pokedex in the video games. Data is fetched using Pokeapi.

Made with React and Bootstrap
Click to see preview
Picture It!

Picture It is a fun way to share drawing or check the weather. Originally built as a fun way to create and share pictures on an LED matrix, Picture It can also display the date, time, and weather with different pictures for each season.

Made with HTML, CSS, JS, and Flask
Click to see preview
Meal Counter

A tool for students at the University of Delaware students to track their meal plan usage to better plan for the rest of their semester. As my first react native project, this app taught me about dynamically rendering components and styles as well as component lifecycles.

Made with React Native
Click to see preview
